original_text: So you will not go into the land that I am giving to the Israelites. You will only see it from far away.’ 32: So you will not go into the land that I am giving to the Israelites. You will only see it from far away.’ 32: So you will not go into the land that I am giving to the Israelites. You will only see it from far away.’
korean_text: 네가 비록 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 주는 땅을 맞은편에서 바라보기는 하려니와 그리로 들어가지는 못하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: So you will not go into the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 그 땅에 들어가지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: that I am giving to the Israelites.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 주는 그 땅에.

sentences.original_text: You will only see it from far away.'
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것을 멀리서만 볼 것이다.'
